title: Map
shortDescription: Help customers find you with a custom map
longDescription:
POWr Map enables you to easily help customers find your stores, events and products in a fully customizable map that can be up and running in seconds. Choose between satellite, roadmap, or hybrid maps, and enjoy an intuitive location panel that lets users jump between multiple locations. In addition, Maps includes highly customizable design, is mobile responsive on any device and supports text in all languages.

 
# What are the benefits of using POWr Map?   

* **Get more customers** - Add a customized map to your site to help customers find your physical stores and events and drive more business.
* **Build confidence** - Showing a physical store location helps build your customers’ confidence in your business and brand, which keeps them coming back.
* **Make it yours** - Customize your map to match your site design with your own colors, borders, location pins and choose between satellite, hybrid or roadmaps.

# Get started for free and enjoy these features:   

* Fully functional in seconds.
* Show up to 5 locations
* Intuitive location panel lets users jump between multiple locations.
* Choose between satellite, roadmap, or hybrid maps.
* Highly customizable design: pick custom colors and fonts, adjust size, add borders, and more.
* Supports text in any language.
* Mobile responsive on any device.
* Instant access to the full [POWr plugin library] (https://www.powr.io/plugins).

# Upgrade to remove POWr branding and unlock premium features, such as:   
* Add a search bar to your map.
* Show from 10, 50 or unlimited locations (depending on your plan).
* Automatically show the location nearest to your customer.
* Add your own custom pins.
* Unlock premium features in other POWr apps.

Full pricing information is available [here] (https://www.powr.io/pricing?app_type=map)

# Why users love Map:   

“Map is very easy to use, update (with a good range of display options)!” - The Cornish Vegan Pasty Company

# Customer Support You Can Count On 

If you have any questions or need help getting Map up and running, we’re here to help! Please visit our [Help Center] (https://powr-support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us) for tips, support, and answers to common questions or contact support@powr.io.

# About POWr 

[POWr] (https://www.powr.io) brings you all the tools you need for effortless business growth, all in one place. With over 50 website plugins available that are easy-to-use and customizable, you'll find everything you need to boost conversions, engage and support customers, grow your following and collect information.
author: POWr Inc

categories.title: UI & Design
categories.description: Apps that make your website more beautiful and user friendly.

products.shortDescription: For businesses looking to test the water with new plugins

products.shortDescription: For businesses who have their own brand and want extra customization.

* Search Bar
* Center on Visitor

products.title: Pro
products.shortDescription: For growing businesses looking to stand out from the crowd and get more conversions.
products.longDescription:

* 50 Locations
* Search Bar
* Center on Visitor
* Custom Pin
* Mass Import via CSV
* Custom CSS & JavaScript
